thread.title: Teen Mom 2's Javi Marroquin & Real World: Skeletons' Madison Channing Walls Are Dating!
thread.title_full: Teen Mom 2's Javi Marroquin & Real World: Skeletons' Madison Channing Walls Are Dating!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Teen Mom 2's Javi Marroquin & Real World: Skeletons' Madison Channing Walls Are Dating!
text:
This is a match made in MTV heaven!
On Tuesday, Real World: Skeletons star Madison Channing Walls revealed she is dating Teen Mom 2 's Javi Marroquin ! Congrats!
Related: This Teen Mom 3 Star Is Pregnant Again 
The blonde gushed:
"Javi and I are definitely together... We are definitely boyfriend and girlfriend." 
But how did the reality TV personalities meet? It all started when Miz Walls slid into Javi's DM on Instagram , and the two couldn't stop talking!
"I love that he is a gentleman... And I like his core values and that he has morals and just what he stands for." 
For their first date, the new couple dined at Marroquin's favorite restaurant in Philadelphia! According to Kailyn Lowry 's ex: 
"We enjoyed a nice bottle of wine and then later I had my friends come out to meet her and we all went out and danced and drank and just had a really good time... It was awesome." 
Things are going so well, the 24-year-old hunk plans to travel to her hometown of Austin, TX to see her stomping grounds.
Although both are parents, they have NOT met each other's children yet. Javi says:
"I haven't introduced [Madison] to [my son] Lincoln yet. I learned from my past mistakes where I introduced him way too early on in a relationship, so now I know better." 
Madison chimed in by saying:
"I'm really excited for him to come to Austin next month. I'm going to introduce him to my friends and family and [my daughter] Harper and yeah it should just be a really good time and then we are already making plans for this summer together." 
But does Miz Lowry -- who is expecting her third child -- know about her ex's new fling??
"Kail knows about the relationship for sure... I'm happy for Kail. I wish her nothing but the best and health and wellness and all of that stuff you know? I'm here for her. We actually are in a good place and I just want health for her and the baby. Lincoln is actually the one who told me she was having a baby... He knows what's going on. He's excited to have another sibling." 
No drama here! 
[ Image via Madison Channing Walls/ Instagram . ]
